text: Ra tyo dina pani varnana yogya cha junadina tiniharula'i ekatrita garnechaum. Ani hamile musrikaharusita bhanne chauh ki timi ra timile thaharya'eka sajhedaraharu aâ€“aphna tha'umharuma ubhirakha. Ani hamile tiniharuma matabheda gara'idinchaum tiniharuka sajhedaraharule bhanne chanh ki timile hamila'i ta pujne gardainathyau
